posts.text: æœ‰å¦‚ä¸‹ç±»å®šä¹‰ï¼šclass MyClass{publicï¼š  MyClass(int d=0): val(d) { }  ____ //è¿ç®—ç¬¦å‡½æ•°+çš„å£°æ˜privateï¼š  int valï¼›}ï¼›è‹¥è¦ä½¿è¯­å¥åºåˆ—MyClass x(2), y(4), zï¼›z=7+yï¼›y=x+3ï¼›èƒ½å¤Ÿæ­£å¸¸è¿è¡Œï¼Œæ¨ªçº¿å¤„çš„å£°æ˜è¯­å¥åº”ä¸ºï¼ˆï¼‰ã€‚A) friend MyClass operator+(MyClass, MyClass);B) friend MyClass operator+(MyClass&, MyClass&);C) friend MyClass operator+(MyClass, MyClass&);D) friend MyClass operator+(MyClass&, MyClass); //æ­£ç¡®  MyClass ï¼†p=new MyClass; //é”™è¯¯  ç©¶å…¶åŸå› ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯å› ä¸ºC++ä¸­ï¼Œä¸èƒ½å®šä¹‰å¼•ç”¨æŒ‡å‘â€œæ— åâ€å¯¹è±¡ã€‚   ä¸‹é¢å°†é¢˜ç›®ä¸­çš„ä»£ç è¡¥å……å®Œæ•´ï¼Œå°†é”™è¯¯é€‰é¡¹Dä»£å…¥æ‰§è¡Œçœ‹çœ‹ï¼Œç¼–è¯‘å™¨æ˜¯å¦çœŸçš„ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼š 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627#include <iostream>using namespace std;class MyClass{public: MyClass(int d = 0) : val(d){} friend MyClass operator + (MyClass&, MyClass); int Getvalue(){ return val; } void Changevalue(int a){ val = a; }private: int val;};MyClass operator + (MyClass &class1, MyClass class2){ MyClass a; a.Changevalue(class1.Getvalue() + class2.Getvalue()); return a;}int main(){ MyClass x(2), y(4), z; z = 7 + y; cout << z.Getvalue() << endl; y = x + 3; return 0;} ç¼–è¯‘å™¨æŠ¥é”™ï¼š
